title: sIr tiruttam vENDum
sahitya:
sIr tiruttam vENDum engaL dEsham sutantarak-kailAsamAi viLangiDa


anupallavi

  pOrinrit-tuyarinrip-pOTTi porAmaiyinri vEronrum kiLaiyena Uronri vaLam pera


caraNam    nalla vAcaspati pOl kalvi tozhil arindu nATTil samayOgak-kUTTuravu niraindu
ellArum ellArum inbura anbuDan EkarasamAi shiva bhOgam kozhittiDavE
